description: The partial demolition of Buildings A and C and complete demolition of Buildings B and D at the Faircharm Trading Estate, Creekside, SE8 3DX, and remodelling, repair, restoration and conversion of Blocks A and C to provide 4,310m2 of mixed commercial floorspace (Block A: 1,786m2 of commercial (Class B1) floorspace and 397m2 of Class B1/B2 floorspace and Block C: 2,127m2 of commercial (Class B1 ) floorspace) with associated plant, servicing and storage. Demolition of Building B and the construction of four new buildings ranging from 6 to 12 storeys to provide 148 residential units (63 x one-bed, 68 x two bed and 17 x 3 bed), and new commercial uses (779m2 of Use Class B1) together with new open space, landscaping, car and cycle parking development. .
